messages.body: $AWI beats by $0.13, beats on revs; guides FY20 revs above consensus https://www.briefing.com/in-depth-analysis/Content/Article?ArticleId=IN20201027060334AWI

links.title: Briefing.com
links.description: AWI: Armstrong World Industries beats by $0.13, beats on revs; guides FY20 revs above consensus (64.91) Reports Q3 (Sep) earnings of $1.07 per share, $0.13 better than the S&P Capital IQ Consensus of $0.94; revenues fell 11.1% year/year to $246.3 mln vs the $231.08 mln S&P Capital IQ Consensus.
